alerts.name: X-Content-Type-Options Header Missing
alerts.description: The Anti-MIME-Sniffing header X-Content-Type-Options was not set to 'nosniff'.
alerts.solution: Ensure that the application/web server sets the Content-Type header appropriately.

alerts.name: X-Frame-Options Header Not Set
alerts.description: X-Frame-Options header is not included in the HTTP response.
alerts.solution: Most modern Web browsers support the X-Frame-Options HTTP header.
